#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define FOR(i,b) for(typeof(b) i = 0; i<b; ++i)
#define FORR(i,a,b) for(typeof(b) i= a; i<=b; ++i)
#define all(c) c.begin(),c.end()
#define sz(c) c.size()
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define x first
#define y second

using namespace std;

typedef long long int ll;
typedef pair<int,int> pii;

const ll mod = 1e9+7;
const int SIZE = 1e5+5;
const ll inf = 0x7fffffff;
//map<char,int> mtpx;
//map<char,int> mtpy;
int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0);
    string x,y;
    int tt;
    map<int,string> ans;
    ans[0]="NO";
    ans[1]="YES";
    cin>>tt;
    while(tt--)
    {
        cin>>x>>y;
        /*int l1=sz(x);
        int l2=sz(y);
        FOR(i,l1) ++mtpx[x[i]-'A'];
        FOR(i,l2) ++mtpy[y[i]-'A'];
        bool ok=1;
        FOR(i,26){
            ok=mtpx[i]==mtpy[i];
            if(!ok)
                break;}
        */
        sort(all(x));
        sort(all(y));
        cout<<ans[x==y]<<endl;
        //mtpx.clear();
        //mtpy.clear();
        }
        return 0;
}
